actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-378.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 3622) to amend title 10, United States Code, to strengthen the position of Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, to provide for more efficient and effective operation of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3622 (Joint Chiefs of Staff).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 3622) to amend title 10, United States Code, to strengthen the position of Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, to provide for more efficient and effective operation of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
